procedures.name: Venipuncture
procedures.label: Blood Draw
procedures.description: Collection of blood samples for laboratory analysis including hematology panel, liver chemistry tests, and biomarkers

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Liver Biopsy
procedures.label: Percutaneous Liver Biopsy
procedures.description: Percutaneous liver biopsy for histological evaluation of NASH and fibrosis staging according to NASH CRN criteria

procedures.name: Magnetic Resonance Imaging
procedures.label: Abdominal MRI with cT1 Mapping
procedures.description: MRI-derived iron-corrected T1 mapping (cT1) to evaluate fibroinflammatory changes in the liver

code.decode: MRI abdomen with and without contrast

procedures.name: FibroScan
procedures.label: Liver Stiffness Measurement
procedures.description: Transient elastography for liver stiffness measurement (LSM) and Controlled Attenuation Parameter (CAP) for liver fat content

procedures.name: Electrocardiogram
procedures.label: ECG
procedures.description: Electrocardiogram assessment for cardiac safety monitoring

code.decode: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with interpretation and report

procedures.name: Chest X-ray
procedures.label: Chest Radiograph
procedures.description: Chest X-ray to evaluate for active TB, infections, heart failure, or malignancy

procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: Physical Exam
procedures.description: Complete physical examination for safety assessment

code.decode: Office or outpatient visit, established patient

procedures.name: Targeted Neurological Assessment
procedures.label: Neurological Exam
procedures.description: Targeted neurological assessment to evaluate for symptoms suggestive of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML)

procedures.name: Vital Signs Measurement
procedures.label: Vital Signs
procedures.description: Measurement of vital signs including blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, and temperature

code.decode: Office visit for evaluation and management

procedures.name: Subcutaneous Injection
procedures.label: SC Injection
procedures.description: Subcutaneous administration of ontamalimab 75 mg every 4 weeks

code.decode: Therapeutic, prophylactic, or diagnostic injection, subcutaneous or intramuscular

procedures.name: Urine Collection
procedures.label: Urine Sample
procedures.description: Collection of urine samples for drug screening and pregnancy testing

code.decode: Urinalysis, by dip stick or tablet reagent

procedures.name: HepQuant-SHUNT Test
procedures.label: HepQuant DSI
procedures.description: HepQuant-SHUNT Disease Severity Index assessment for hepatocellular function evaluation

code.decode: Unlisted special service, procedure or report

procedures.name: Interferon-Gamma Release Assay
procedures.label: IGRA TB Test
procedures.description: Blood test for detection of latent tuberculosis infection

code.decode: Tuberculosis test, cell mediated immunity antigen response measurement

procedures.name: Mantoux Tuberculin Skin Test
procedures.label: TB Skin Test
procedures.description: Tuberculin skin test for TB screening when IGRA results are indeterminate

procedures.name: Pregnancy Testing
procedures.label: Pregnancy Test
procedures.description: Pregnancy testing for female participants of childbearing potential

procedures.name: Immunogenicity Assessment
procedures.label: Anti-Drug Antibody Testing
procedures.description: Blood sample collection for immunogenicity assessments including anti-drug antibody testing

procedures.name: Weight and Height Measurement
procedures.label: Anthropometric Measurements
procedures.description: Measurement of body weight and height for BMI calculation

procedures.name: Hypersensitivity Monitoring
procedures.label: Allergic Reaction Monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring for hypersensitivity reactions following study drug administration

procedures.name: Alcohol Screening
procedures.label: Alcohol Test
procedures.description: Screening for alcohol use

procedures.name: Urine Drug Screening
procedures.label: Drug Screen
procedures.description: Urine screening for amphetamines, cocaine, and opioids

medicalDevices.name: Prefilled Syringe
medicalDevices.label: PFS
medicalDevices.description: Glass prefilled syringe with fixed needle containing 1 mL of ontamalimab solution for subcutaneous injection at 75 mg/mL concentration

medicalDevices.name: FibroScan
medicalDevices.label: Transient Elastography Device
medicalDevices.description: Device for liver stiffness measurement (LSM) and Controlled Attenuation Parameter (CAP) assessment

medicalDevices.name: MRI Scanner
medicalDevices.label: Magnetic Resonance Imaging Equipment
medicalDevices.description: MRI equipment for iron-corrected T1 mapping (cT1) of the liver

medicalDevices.name: ECG Device
medicalDevices.label: Electrocardiograph
medicalDevices.description: Device for recording electrocardiograms for cardiac safety monitoring

medicalDevices.label: Radiography Equipment
